alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 31 at 9:24PM MST until July 31 at 10:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE BIGHORN BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR EASTERN PIMA COUNTY... At 924 PM MST, Earlier thunderstorms produced heavy rain over the Bighorn Burn Scar and in Finger Rock Canyon. The worst flash flooding has ended, however at least minor flows continue in Finger Rock Wash. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Bighorn Burn Scar. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Bighorn Burn Scar. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Finger Rock Wash. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
